title: Brittney Grinerâ€™s Prison Term Is Upheld by Russian Court
description: The W.N.B.A. athlete is facing nine years in a Russian prison on a drug charge. A prisoner swap may be her only path home.
dc:creator: Ivan Nechepurenko, Neil MacFarquhar and Jonathan Abrams
media:description: Brittney Griner speaking with her lawyers in a courtroom in July. Addressing the court on Tuesday, she protested her unusually long sentence.
